ing: 1 tablespoon jarred roasted red peppers, chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This curried egg salad is kicked up a notch with olives, capers, and roasted red peppers."
ins: Combine eggs, olives, roasted red peppers, and capers in a bowl. Stir mayonnaise and curry powder into egg mixture; season with salt and pepper.
